arStrings.szText: Casting {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} will consume {c_important}{u}Blood Orbs{/u}{/c} to also conjure lances from them. Each additional {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} of normal damage and prioritizes targeting un-lanced enemies.

Casting {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} consumes {c_important}{u}Blood Orbs{/u}{/c} to conjure more {c_important}Blood Lances{/c}. Each additional {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} of normal damage.
